CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 6, 1958, pg. 2 reads: "School Head Listens - Dr. Calvin E. Gross (leaning against pole), who was at Bennett School Tuesday morning during the re-opening, listens to (left to right) Mrs. Russell Prata, Mrs. T.R.Richardson and Richard Adams, three of a group of Homewood parents who maintain that the School Board, in its emergency plans, neglected to take adequate safety measures for the long distances children will have to travel to and from school. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Mrs. Russell Prata, Dr. Calvin E. Gross, leaning against pole, Mrs. T.R. Richardson, and Richard Adams, standing with girl at corner of Bennett Public School
